snippet: Fall brings new men’s pieces, like soft briefcases and tone-on-tone watches, that take cues from classic banker style without making their wearer look like a salaryman.
abstract: Fall brings new men’s pieces, like soft briefcases and tone-on-tone watches, that take cues from classic banker style without making their wearer look like a salaryman.

headline.main: Establishment Accessories That Go Against the Grain
